Script.ScriptSource:
;Disable DC set bInDCWasteland to 0
RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.Disable RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.Disable MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.Disable RadioEnclaveRef.Disable MS17RadioRef.Disable DLC01RadioStationREF.Disable DLC02OutcastRadioSignalRef.Disable DLC05AlienRadioBeaconREF.Disable
PipBoyRadioOff

;Enable DC set bInDCWasteland to 1
if ( GetStage MQ09 < 60 ) RadioEnclaveRef.Enable elseif ( MQ09.RRDestroy == 0 ) RadioEnclaveRef.Enable endif
if ( GNRDishDone == 0 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.Enable elseif ( GNRDishDone == 1 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.Enable endif
if ( GetStageDone MS17 100 == 1 ) MS17RadioRef.Enable endif
if ( GetStageDone MS16 200 == 0 && GetStageDone MQ05 200 == 1 ) MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.Enable endif
if ( GetStage DLC01Quest01 < 50 ) DLC01RadioStationREF.Enable endif
if ( GetObjectiveCompleted DLC02OA1 15 == 0 ) DLC02OutcastRadioSignalRef.Enable endif
if ( GetQuestRunning DLC05Post == 0 ) DLC05AlienRadioBeaconREF.Enable endif
PipBoyRadioOff

;Advance game date based on iDaysToPass, TTWFunctions.iMonthsToPass, TTWFunctions.iYearsToPass
set TTWFunctions.iYearsToPass to TTWFunctions.iYearsToPass + (TTWFunctions.iMonthsToPass/12) + (TTWFunctions.iDaysToPass/365) set TTWFunctions.iDaysToPass to TTWFunctions.iDaysToPass%365 set TTWFunctions.iMonthsToPass to TTWFunctions.iMonthsToPass%12
set GameYear to GameYear + TTWFunctions.iYearsToPass set TTWFunctions.iYearsToPass to 0
set GameMonth to GameMonth + TTWFunctions.iMonthsToPass set TTWFunctions.iMonthsToPass to 0
if GameMonth > 12 set GameYear to GameYear + 1 set GameMonth to GameMonth - 12 endif
set GameDay to GameDay + TTWFunctions.iDaysToPass
;Note: because we don't have loops this section INTENTIONALLY cycles the months TWICE, ;to ensure that advancing 364 days on December 31st works properly
if GameMonth == 1 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 2 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 2 && GameDay > 28 set GameMonth to 3 set GameDay to GameDay - 28 endif if GameMonth == 3 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 4 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 4 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 5 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 5 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 6 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 6 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 7 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 7 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 8 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 8 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 9 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 9 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 10 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 10 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 11 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 11 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 12 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 12 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 1 set GameYear to GameYear + 1 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 1 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 2 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 2 && GameDay > 28 set GameMonth to 3 set GameDay to GameDay - 28 endif if GameMonth == 3 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 4 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 4 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 5 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 5 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 6 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 6 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 7 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 7 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 8 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 8 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 9 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 9 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 10 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 10 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 11 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif if GameMonth == 11 && GameDay > 30 set GameMonth to 12 set GameDay to GameDay - 30 endif if GameMonth == 12 && GameDay > 31 set GameMonth to 1 set GameYear to GameYear + 1 set GameDay to GameDay - 31 endif
set TTWFunctions.iDaysToPass to 0

; Run a worldspace check
; Local Vars int iIdx int iCnt ref rLst ref rWrld ref rMap
if (Player.IsInInterior) Return endif
set rWrld to Player.GetParentWorldspace
set iIdx to 0 set iCnt to (listGetCount TTWWorldSpacesCheckerList) label 1 if (iIdx < iCnt) set rLst to listGetNthForm TTWWorldSpacesCheckerList iIdx if (listGetFormIndex rLst rWrld != -1) set TTWFunctions.iIndex to (iIdx + 1) set TTWFunctions.rWorldList to rLst set iIdx to iCnt endif set iIdx to iIdx + 1 goto 1 endif
if (IsFormValid rLst) ; Get the mapper quest from the returned List and run the location setter on it set rMap to ListGetNthForm rLst 0 set TTWWorldLocation to 0 SetStage rMap 252 endif

; FALLOUT 3 WORLDS ============================================================================================================================== if (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 1) ; General Wasteland and encompassed spaces set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 1 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 2) ; Downtown DC areas set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 2 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 3) ; The Pitt set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 4 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 4) ; Anchorage set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 8 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 5) ; Broken Steel set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 16 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 6) ; Point Lookout set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 32
; FALLOUT NV WORLDS ================================================================================================================================= elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 7) ; Fallout New Vegas set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 512 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 8) ; Dead Money set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 1024 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 9) ; Honest Hearts set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 2048 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 10) ; Old World Blues set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 4096 elseif (TTWFunctions.iIndex == 11) ; Lonesome Road set TTWWorldLocation to LogicalOr TTWWorldLocation 8192 endif

Entry.LogEntry: Output some common worldspace location data. Use for testing.

Script.ScriptSource: printc "%r==================================================" printc "Current location value is %g" TTWWorldLocation if (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 1) printc "In DC or environs" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 2) printc "In Downtown DC" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 4) printc "In The Pitt" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 8) printc "In Anchorage" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 16) printc "In Broken Steel" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 32) printc "In Point Lookout" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 512) printc "In New Vegas or environs" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 1024) printc "In Dead Money" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 2048) printc "In Honest Hearts" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 4096) printc "In Old World Blues" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 8192) printc "In Lonesome Road" endif printc "-------------------------" printc "Now testing various dual locationalities" if (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 61) printc "In Fallout 3 Worlds" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 3) printc "In Capital Wasteland" elseif (LogicalAnd TTWWorldLocation 15872) printc "In New Vegas Worlds" endif
set TTWHasNVSE to 0 set TTWNVSEVersion to 0 set TTWHasNVSE to (getNVSEVersion > 0) set TTWNVSEVersion to getNVSEVersion set TTWNVSEVersionBeta to getNVSEBeta
